channel.title: Jinlai Xu's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Jinlai Xu's Homepage

item.description: Jinlai Xu is a PhD student of Information Science at University of Pittsburgh. His research interests include Distributed Systems, Fog/Edge and Cloud Computing, Computer Vision and Robotics. His current advisor is Balaji Palanisamy. Before coming to University of Pittsburgh, he graduated from China University of Geosciences and his undergraduate and graduate advisor is Zhongwen Luo. Full Curriculum Vitae
